document.full_text: a former u.s. drug informant who said he worked with pakistan's intelligence agency on planning the 2008 pakistani militant attack on mumbai testified on tuesday that agency higher-ups were unaware of the plot.
document.title: u.s. witness says isi chiefs unaware of mumbai plot
lines_and_colors: a former u.s. drug informant who said he worked with pakistan's intelligence agency on planning the 2008 pakistani militant attack on mumbai testified on tuesday that agency higher-ups were unaware of the plot.
